info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: The Burrowing Heaven
collection.openText: Don’t look away, just keep on watching. Contain it inside your sight.

observe.desc: [ {Don’t look away, just keep on watching. It lives inside your eyes. The containment unit means nothing. Contain it inside your sight. Blinking is okay, it will tolerate a brief moment. But when it thinks you have lost attention and concentration, it will spread its wings. Wings, yes, wings. Like paying tribute to a long forgotten god, its bloody wings will extend, as if to cover the entire corridor. There are fruits on its wings. It uses recently deceased bodies as fertilizer. If it still doesn’t attract your attention, the stalks will head towards a sunny location, impaling the company in the process. Like an angel, its wings will extend toward the skies and black out the sun, but there’s still hope. When you finally decide to move your eyes and bring it to your consciousness, it will return back to this deep and dark subterranean area, if you’re still alive, that is.} ]

[ {That’s what gazing is. Attention. A string of invisible links. Full concentration. Don’t come here, there’s no place for you to rest. But you see, I could finally bear fruit only when I’m inside your sight. Is this what you wanted? When your tears dry up, tell me your answer.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: Work on $0 must be done while the Manager is overseeing the Containment Unit.

When the Containment Unit is out of the surveillance camera’s sight, $0‘s Qliphoth counter will be reduced. When $0‘s Containment Unit is not monitored even after the phenomenon, the Qliphoth counter will continue to decrease.
When the work result is Medium or better, $0‘s Qliphoth counter will increase. It seems that a maximum of 3 levels could be increased, based on the work results.
<Warning>Do not stop looking at the Abnormality while suppression is in progress
